channel.title: Melvin Jones Repol - Software Engineer
channel.description: I'm a Self-taught Freelance Software Engineer with experience in full-stack web development, seo, data analyics, embedded system design with arduino programming, hardware & software troubleshooting and PWA.

item.title: 100+ ChatGPT Prompts You should use - Melvin Jones Repol
item.description: ChatGPT is a powerful tool that helps you create natural conversations with AI. It provides over 100+ prompt templates to help you create engaging conversations. It is easy to use and can be used to create conversations for various applications.

item.title: What's My User Agent?
item.description: A user agent is any program that retrieves, renders, and supports end-user interaction with Web information on behalf of a user. As a result, a user agent is a unique type of software agent.
item.creator: Melvin Jones Repol

item.title: What's My IP Address?
item.description: An Internet Protocol address, such as 192.0.2.1, is a numerical label that identifies a computer network that communicates using the Internet Protocol. The fundamental functionalities of an IP address are network interface identification and location addressing.
item.creator: Melvin Jones Repol
